column4: w0lw0n: To my knowledge, that should work fine, I don't think Ubuntu is hardware-dependant (not sure if thats the right wording...)

Heres one for you guys... Firefox will randomly stop loading some web pages half way through... I've tried all the usual tricks (disabling IPv6, full reinstall of Firefox and all addons, disable all addons....) nothing works.. Any ideas before I wipe and reload?
Haven't actually tested any other browser, good idea... Any recommendations that I can get via Synaptic?
